ComicInfo.Title: Duck Death; The Case of the Missing Quack; Pig-Foot the Awful Boar; Deserter; The Rabbit Wonder Meets the Barbarian Bunny
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Quack humor anthology continues with more early work from Dave Sim and Scott Shaw!
Editorial: Friedrich (1 page text)
The Beavers: Sim (4 pages)
The Wraith: Duck Death: Gilbert (12 pages)
E.Z. Wolf as Wolfjack: The Case of the Missing Quack: Richards, Gonick, Leonard (10 pages)
You-All Gibbon: Pig-Foot, the Awful Boar!: Shaw (6 pages)
Deserter: Macklin (8 pages)
Newton, the Rabbit Wonder Meets the Barbarian Bunny: Leialoha, Nino (8 pages)
*Newton, the Rabbit Wonder is a spoof of Michael Moorcock's Elric.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:06:09. [CVDB17372]
ComicInfo.Writer: Dave Sim, Michael T. Gilbert, Ted Richards, Scott Shaw!, Ken Macklin, Steve Leialoha, Larry Gonick, Mike Friedrich, Scott Shaw
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Sim, Michael T. Gilbert, Ted Richards, Scott Shaw!, Ken Macklin, Steve Leialoha, Alex Niño, Alex Niño, Dave Sim, Ken Macklin, Larry Gonick, Michael T. Gilbert, Scott Shaw, Steve Leialoha, Ted Richards
ComicInfo.Inker: Dave Sim, Michael T. Gilbert, J. Michael Leonard, Larry Gonick, Scott Shaw!, Ken Macklin, Alex Niño, Dave Sim, Larry Gonick, Scott Shaw, Steve Leialoha, Ted Richards
ComicInfo.Letterer: Dave Sim, Tom Orzechowski, Ted Richards, Carolyn Lay, Ken Macklin, Steve Leialoha, Carol Lay, Michael T. Gilbert
